column1: TABLE 1. SELECTED EXPERIMENTAL THERAPIES UNDER DEVELOPMENT FOR COVID-19

column2: Aerosolized delivery of siRNA chemistry optimized for lung uptake
column3: Alnylam has synthesized 350 siRNAs to SARS-CoV2;Vir will conduct in vitro and in vivo testing

column2: Respiratory-specific siRNA formulation that is delivered by a customized handheld nebulizer device
Recombinant ACE2 enzyme (APN01; binds virus in circulation and blocks entry)
column3: 24 patients in randomized, unblinded clinical trial in China

column2: Fully human IgG1 mAbs targeting SARS-CoV-2 developed from polyclonal antibodies identified in sera of convalescent patients
column3: Discovered 500 unique antibodies from one patient with COVID-19
column4: Eli Lilly for manufacture and scale-up

column2: Fully human IgG1 mAb targeting complement factor 5a
column3: Approved for phase 1 clinical trials in China in February 2020

column2: Sylvant (siltuximab), human IgG1κ mAb against IL-6
column3: Observational case–control study in patients with respiratory symptoms

column2: Fully human IgG1 mAb (47D11) targeting the full-length spike (S) proteins of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2
column3: Antibody reformatted from chimeric mAb identified via SARS2-S1 subunit screening in hybridomas derived from mice engineered with two human heavy and light chains and a rat constant region (H2L2)
column4: Research partnership with Mount Sinai Health System

column2: Fully human IgG1 mAbs targeting multiple undisclosed epitopes (polytope) on SARS-CoV-2
column3: Reactive B cells were profiled in animals immunized with designed SARS-CoV-2 target antigens (e.g., S protein or Nsp15) and phage display used to identify neutralizing mAbs that show broad cross-species reactivity, which are reformatted as fully human molecules
column4: EVQLV to provide computational antibody design expertise to optimize novel mAbs. Ligand Pharmaceuticals to combine its OmniMab platform with B Cell Select and DeepDisplay antibody technologies.

column2: Fully human IgG1 mAb against complement factor 5a
column3: Approved for clinical trial in China

column2: Human IgG1 mAbs targeting SARS-CoV-2 developed from polyclonal antibodies identified in sera of convalescent patients
column3: Vir has also identified two mAbs targeting the human angiotensin-converting enzyme ACE2 receptor
column4: WuXi and Biogen to provide scale-up/manufacturing in China and United States, respectively

column2: SARS-CoV-2 S protein chemically attached to virucidal nanomicelle flexible polymer and polyethylene glycol
Aplidin natural product from marine tunicate Aplidium albicans, targeting elongation factor 1A
column3: Positive in vitro studies against SARS-CoV-2–related coronavirus, requesting IND from regulators in mid-March

column1: Does not include polyclonal or IgG products extracted from convalescent patient serum. Sources: BioWorld, company sites, Thomson Cortellis, PubMed
